name: part_011
file: tmp_【#hololivefesEXPO24_DAY1】hololive 5th fes. Capture the Moment hololive stage1 DAY1【チラ見せ】 [00xeNL3vdQo]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_011.mov

scenes.description: A slideshow featuring a collection of handwritten and typed messages from hololive members and fans, expressing excitement and support for the 'hololive 5th fes. Capture the Moment' event.
Title card for 'hololive stage1' featuring the main visual of the event and an announcement that the concert will start soon.
Attention slides for visitors, providing guidelines on lighting effects and cheering rules in both Japanese and English.
Introduction of official merchandise for the event, including penlights, t-shirts, and towels, along with their respective sales periods.
Continuation of the message slideshow from fans and members, accompanied by upbeat instrumental music.
